25 coins, no duplicates 5 metals × 5 multipliers = 25 unique designs. Each metal comes in unit (shiny) and with engraved multipliers (matte finish). Contents: 5 copper coins: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 5 silver coins: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 5 electrum coins: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 5 gold coins: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 5 platinum coins: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 Everything included — no selection needed. Use multipliers to speed up counting without breaking immersion.
